name: Temp In Charge
description:
President has pneumonia and you are his temp for one week. You must make decisions about current pandemic and economy. But fear not with help of EasyGuv 6000 system running a government has never been easy. Find solutions to your problems with just few clicks.

Game is developed for complexity Jam.

**For the best experience please download windows executable

**if you play on browser for better performance don't play fullscreen
